workExperience.title: Software Developer
workExperience.description:
Rebranding the company's website and admin dashboard using Typescript, NextJS, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Mantine UI, etc to increase the company's revenue and efficiency.

Developed complex operational workflow for brokers, admin, and the marketing team to manage their clients and leads efficiently.

Developing modern and responsive frontend UI using Mantine UI and Framer Motion for a seamless user experience.

Developed a Slack App integration with the Whatsapp Cloud API in Python for efficient lead generation and conversion.

Developed a custom CMS system for internationalization and localization of the website, supporting 6 languages worldwide.

Actively enhancing the company's website SEO through performance optimization and new strategies.

Participating in product development meetings and providing insights to improve the product for the market.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer Intern
workExperience.description: I worked on a File Tagging Application using .NET Framework 4.7.2 Windows Form, C#, and SQLite Database. This application allows users to add tags to files in NTFS file systems for easier searching and organization. Tags can include categories like School, College, Important, Work, etc.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
workExperience.description: Worked as a Backend and ReactJS developer intern. Developed a full-fledged Authentication System using NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and JWT. Integrated Send Grid API for email sending and Razorpay Payment Gateway for payment processing. Implemented lightweight UI and complex animations using Tailwind CSS and Material UI.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Development Mentor
workExperience.description: Mentored 100+ students to become Full Stack Developers. Solved doubts related to ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB. Taught students about effective communication skills and mentored them with problem-solving, Data Structures, and Algorithm challenges.
